get.summary: Gets all artists from a given item, folder, or the entire library

parameters.name: ArtistType
parameters.description: Artist or AlbumArtist

parameters.name: MaxOfficialRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by maximum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

parameters.name: HasThemeSong
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with theme songs.

parameters.name: HasThemeVideo
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with theme videos.

parameters.name: HasSubtitles
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with subtitles.

parameters.name: HasSpecialFeature
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with special features.

parameters.name: HasTrailer
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with trailers.

parameters.name: AdjacentTo
parameters.description: Optional. Return items that are siblings of a supplied item.

parameters.name: MinIndexNumber
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum index number.

parameters.name: MinStartDate
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MaxStartDate
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MinEndDate
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MaxEndDate
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MinPlayers
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum number of game players.

parameters.name: MaxPlayers
parameters.description: Optional filter by maximum number of game players.

parameters.name: ParentIndexNumber
parameters.description: Optional filter by parent index number.

parameters.name: HasParentalRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have or do not have a parental rating

parameters.name: IsHD
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are HD or not.

parameters.name: IsUnaired
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are unaired episodes or not.

parameters.name: MinCommunityRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum community rating.

parameters.name: MinCriticRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum critic rating.

parameters.name: AiredDuringSeason
parameters.description: Gets all episodes that aired during a season, including specials.

parameters.name: MinPremiereDate
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MinDateLastSaved
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MinDateLastSavedForUser
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MaxPremiereDate
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: HasOverview
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have an overview or not.

parameters.name: HasImdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have an imdb id or not.

parameters.name: HasTmdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have a tmdb id or not.

parameters.name: HasTvdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have a tvdb id or not.

parameters.name: ExcludeItemIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered by exxcluding item ids. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: StartIndex
parameters.description: Optional. The record index to start at. All items with a lower index will be dropped from the results.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: Recursive
parameters.description: When searching within folders, this determines whether or not the search will be recursive. true/false

parameters.name: SearchTerm
parameters.description: Enter a search term to perform a search request

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description: Sort Order - Ascending,Descending

parameters.name: ParentId
parameters.description: Specify this to localize the search to a specific item or folder. Omit to use the root

parameters.name: Fields
parameters.description: Optional. Specify additional fields of information to return in the output. This allows multiple, comma delimeted. Options: Budget, Chapters, DateCreated, Genres, HomePageUrl, IndexOptions, MediaStreams, Overview, ParentId, Path, People, ProviderIds, PrimaryImageAspectRatio, Revenue, SortName, Studios, Taglines

parameters.name: ExcludeItemTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on item type. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: IncludeItemTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on item type. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: AnyProviderIdEquals
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, result will be filtered to contain only items which match at least one of the specified IDs. Each provider ID must be in the form 'prov.id', e.g. 'imdb.tt123456'. This allows multiple, comma delimeted value pairs.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Optional. Specify additional filters to apply. This allows multiple, comma delimeted. Options: IsFolder, IsNotFolder, IsUnplayed, IsPlayed, IsFavorite, IsResumable, Likes, Dislikes

parameters.name: IsFavorite
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are marked as favorite, or not.

parameters.name: IsMovie
parameters.description: Optional filter for movies.

parameters.name: IsSeries
parameters.description: Optional filter for series.

parameters.name: IsFolder
parameters.description: Optional filter for folders.

parameters.name: IsNews
parameters.description: Optional filter for news.

parameters.name: IsKids
parameters.description: Optional filter for kids.

parameters.name: IsSports
parameters.description: Optional filter for sports.

parameters.name: IsNew
parameters.description: Optional filter for IsNew.

parameters.name: IsPremiere
parameters.description: Optional filter for IsPremiere.

parameters.name: IsNewOrPremiere
parameters.description: Optional filter for IsNewOrPremiere.

parameters.name: IsRepeat
parameters.description: Optional filter for IsRepeat.

parameters.name: ProjectToMedia
parameters.description: ProjectToMedia

parameters.name: MediaTypes
parameters.description: Optional filter by MediaType. Allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: ImageTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on those containing image types. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Optional. Specify one or more sort orders, comma delimeted. Options: Album, AlbumArtist, Artist, Budget, CommunityRating, CriticRating, DateCreated, DatePlayed, PlayCount, PremiereDate, ProductionYear, SortName, Random, Revenue, Runtime

parameters.name: IsPlayed
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are played, or not.

parameters.name: Genres
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on genre. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: OfficialRatings
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on OfficialRating. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on tag. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: ExcludeTags
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on tag. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: Years
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on production year. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: EnableImages
parameters.description: Optional, include image information in output

parameters.name: EnableUserData
parameters.description: Optional, include user data

parameters.name: ImageTypeLimit
parameters.description: Optional, the max number of images to return, per image type

parameters.name: EnableImageTypes
parameters.description: Optional. The image types to include in the output.

parameters.name: Person
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person.

parameters.name: PersonIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person.

parameters.name: PersonTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, along with Person, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person and PersonType. Allows multiple, comma-delimited

parameters.name: Studios
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on studio. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: StudioIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on studio. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: Artists
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on artist. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: ArtistIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on artist. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: Albums
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on album. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: Ids
parameters.description: Optional. If specific items are needed, specify a list of item id's to retrieve. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: VideoTypes
parameters.description: Optional filter by VideoType (videofile, dvd, bluray, iso). Allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: Containers
parameters.description: Optional filter by Container. Allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: AudioCodecs
parameters.description: Optional filter by AudioCodec. Allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: AudioLayouts
parameters.description: Optional filter by AudioLayout. Allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: VideoCodecs
parameters.description: Optional filter by VideoCodec. Allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: ExtendedVideoTypes
parameters.description: Optional filter by ExtendedVideoType. Allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: SubtitleCodecs
parameters.description: Optional filter by SubtitleCodec. Allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: Optional filter by Path.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: User Id

parameters.name: MinOfficialRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

parameters.name: IsLocked
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are locked.

parameters.name: IsPlaceHolder
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are placeholders

parameters.name: HasOfficialRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have official ratings

parameters.name: GroupItemsIntoCollections
parameters.description: Whether or not to hide items behind their boxsets.

parameters.name: Is3D
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are 3D, or not.

parameters.name: SeriesStatus
parameters.description: Optional filter by Series Status. Allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: NameStartsWithOrGreater
parameters.description: Optional filter by items whose name is sorted equally or greater than a given input string.

parameters.name: ArtistStartsWithOrGreater
parameters.description: Optional filter by items whose name is sorted equally or greater than a given input string.

parameters.name: AlbumArtistStartsWithOrGreater
parameters.description: Optional filter by items whose name is sorted equally or greater than a given input string.

parameters.name: NameStartsWith
parameters.description: Optional filter by items whose name is sorted equally than a given input string.

parameters.name: NameLessThan
parameters.description: Optional filter by items whose name is equally or lesser than a given input string.

200.description: Operation successful. Returning a QueryResult<BaseItemDto> object.

parameters.description: Optional. Specify a audio codec to encode to, e.g. mp3. If omitted the server will auto-select using the url's extension. Options: aac, mp3, vorbis, wma.

parameters.name: EnableAutoStreamCopy
parameters.description: Whether or not to allow automatic stream copy if requested values match the original source. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: AudioSampleRate
parameters.description: Optional. Specify a specific audio sample rate, e.g. 44100

parameters.name: AudioBitRate
parameters.description: Optional. Specify an audio bitrate to encode to, e.g. 128000. If omitted this will be left to encoder defaults.

parameters.name: AudioChannels
parameters.description: Optional. Specify a specific number of audio channels to encode to, e.g. 2

parameters.name: MaxAudioChannels
parameters.description: Optional. Specify a maximum number of audio channels to encode to, e.g. 2

parameters.name: Static
parameters.description: Optional. If true, the original file will be streamed statically without any encoding. Use either no url extension or the original file extension. true/false

parameters.name: CopyTimestamps
parameters.description: Whether or not to copy timestamps when transcoding with an offset. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: StartTimeTicks
parameters.description: Optional. Specify a starting offset, in ticks. 1ms = 10000 ticks.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Optional. The fixed horizontal resolution of the encoded video.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Optional. The fixed vertical resolution of the encoded video.

parameters.name: MaxWidth
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum horizontal resolution of the encoded video.

parameters.name: MaxHeight
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum vertical resolution of the encoded video.

parameters.name: VideoBitRate
parameters.description: Optional. Specify a video bitrate to encode to, e.g. 500000. If omitted this will be left to encoder defaults.

parameters.name: SubtitleStreamIndex
parameters.description: Optional. The index of the subtitle stream to use. If omitted no subtitles will be used.

parameters.name: SubtitleMethod
parameters.description: Optional. Specify the subtitle delivery method.

parameters.name: MaxVideoBitDepth
parameters.description: Optional.

parameters.name: VideoCodec
parameters.description: Optional. Specify a video codec to encode to, e.g. h264. If omitted the server will auto-select using the url's extension. Options: h264, mpeg4, theora, vpx, wmv.

parameters.name: VideoStreamIndex
parameters.description: Optional. The index of the video stream to use. If omitted the first video stream will be used.

parameters.description: Optional. Apply a foreground layer on top of the image.

parameters.description: Set to true to force normalization of orientation in the event the renderer does not support it.

parameters.description: Set to true to retain image animation (when supported).

get.summary: Gets items based on a query.

parameters.name: ArtistType
parameters.description: Artist or AlbumArtist

parameters.name: MaxOfficialRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by maximum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

parameters.name: HasThemeSong
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with theme songs.

parameters.name: HasThemeVideo
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with theme videos.

parameters.name: HasSubtitles
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with subtitles.

parameters.name: HasSpecialFeature
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with special features.

parameters.name: HasTrailer
parameters.description: Optional filter by items with trailers.

parameters.name: AdjacentTo
parameters.description: Optional. Return items that are siblings of a supplied item.

parameters.name: MinIndexNumber
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum index number.

parameters.name: MinStartDate
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MaxStartDate
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MinEndDate
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MaxEndDate
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MinPlayers
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum number of game players.

parameters.name: MaxPlayers
parameters.description: Optional filter by maximum number of game players.

parameters.name: ParentIndexNumber
parameters.description: Optional filter by parent index number.

parameters.name: HasParentalRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have or do not have a parental rating

parameters.name: IsHD
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are HD or not.

parameters.name: IsUnaired
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are unaired episodes or not.

parameters.name: MinCommunityRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum community rating.

parameters.name: MinCriticRating
parameters.description: Optional filter by minimum critic rating.

parameters.name: AiredDuringSeason
parameters.description: Gets all episodes that aired during a season, including specials.

parameters.name: MinPremiereDate
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MinDateLastSaved
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MinDateLastSavedForUser
parameters.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: MaxPremiereDate
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum premiere date. Format = ISO

parameters.name: HasOverview
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have an overview or not.

parameters.name: HasImdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have an imdb id or not.

parameters.name: HasTmdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have a tmdb id or not.

parameters.name: HasTvdbId
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that have a tvdb id or not.

parameters.name: ExcludeItemIds
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered by exxcluding item ids. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: StartIndex
parameters.description: Optional. The record index to start at. All items with a lower index will be dropped from the results.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: Recursive
parameters.description: When searching within folders, this determines whether or not the search will be recursive. true/false

parameters.name: SearchTerm
parameters.description: Enter a search term to perform a search request

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description: Sort Order - Ascending,Descending

parameters.name: ParentId
parameters.description: Specify this to localize the search to a specific item or folder. Omit to use the root

parameters.name: Fields
parameters.description: Optional. Specify additional fields of information to return in the output. This allows multiple, comma delimeted. Options: Budget, Chapters, DateCreated, Genres, HomePageUrl, IndexOptions, MediaStreams, Overview, ParentId, Path, People, ProviderIds, PrimaryImageAspectRatio, Revenue, SortName, Studios, Taglines

parameters.name: ExcludeItemTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on item type. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: IncludeItemTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on item type. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parameters.name: AnyProviderIdEquals
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, result will be filtered to contain only items which match at least one of the specified IDs. Each provider ID must be in the form 'prov.id', e.g. 'imdb.tt123456'. This allows multiple, comma delimeted value pairs.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Optional. Specify additional filters to apply. This allows multiple, comma delimeted. Options: IsFolder, IsNotFolder, IsUnplayed, IsPlayed, IsFavorite, IsResumable, Likes, Dislikes

parameters.name: IsFavorite
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are marked as favorite, or not.

parameters.name: IsMovie
parameters.description: Optional filter for movies.

parameters.name: IsSeries
parameters.description: Optional filter for series.

parameters.name: IsFolder
parameters.description: Optional filter for folders.

parameters.name: IsNews
parameters.description: Optional filter for news.

parameters.name: IsKids
parameters.description: Optional filter for kids.

parameters.name: IsSports
parameters.description: Optional filter for sports.

parameters.name: IsNew
parameters.description: Optional filter for IsNew.

parameters.name: IsPremiere
parameters.description: Optional filter for IsPremiere.

parameters.name: IsNewOrPremiere
parameters.description: Optional filter for IsNewOrPremiere.

parameters.name: IsRepeat
parameters.description: Optional filter for IsRepeat.

parameters.name: ProjectToMedia
parameters.description: ProjectToMedia

parameters.name: MediaTypes
parameters.description: Optional filter by MediaType. Allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: ImageTypes
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on those containing image types. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Optional. Specify one or more sort orders, comma delimeted. Options: Album, AlbumArtist, Artist, Budget, CommunityRating, CriticRating, DateCreated, DatePlayed, PlayCount, PremiereDate, ProductionYear, SortName, Random, Revenue, Runtime

parameters.name: IsPlayed
parameters.description: Optional filter by items that are played, or not.

parameters.name: Genres
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on genre. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: OfficialRatings

parameters.name: Tags

parameters.name: ExcludeTags
parameters.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on tag. This allows multiple, pipe delimeted.

parameters.name: Years

parameters.name: EnableUserData

parameters.name: ImageTypeLimit

parameters.name: EnableUserData
parameters.description: Optional, include user data

BaseItemDto.description: This is strictly used as a data transfer object from the api layer. This holds information about a BaseItem in a format that is convenient for the client.

IsFolder.description: A value indicating whether this instance is folder.

ParentLogoItemId.description: If the item does not have a logo, this will hold the Id of the Parent that has one.

ParentBackdropItemId.description: If the item does not have any backdrops, this will hold the Id of the Parent that has one.

PrimaryImageAspectRatio.description: The primary image aspect ratio, after image enhancements.

LockData.description: A value indicating whether \[enable internet providers\].

StartDate.description: The start date of the recording, in UTC.

IsRepeat.description: A value indicating whether this instance is repeat.

IsMovie.description: A value indicating whether this instance is movie.

IsSports.description: A value indicating whether this instance is sports.

IsSeries.description: A value indicating whether this instance is series.

IsLive.description: A value indicating whether this instance is live.

IsNews.description: A value indicating whether this instance is news.

IsKids.description: A value indicating whether this instance is kids.

IsPremiere.description: A value indicating whether this instance is premiere.

IsRemote.description: Differentiate internet url vs local network

ItemId.description: Used only by our Windows app. Not used by Emby Server. The id of the item that this mediasource belongs to, if there is one Also used by Emby for Kodi

ServerId.description: Used only by our Windows app. Not used by Emby Server.

MediaStream information.


MediaStream itens are typically included in a `MediaBrowser.Model.Dto.MediaSourceInfo` object.


`MediaBrowser.Model.Dto.MediaSourceInfo.MediaStreams`

Applies to: `MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.MediaStreamType.Audio`, `MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.MediaStreamType.Subtitle`.

Probe Field: `color_transfer`

SecondaryFrameworks.description:
Enum defining secondary frameworks for encoding and decoding.


While most of these are hardware acceleration frameworks, this is not a necessity             (e.g. Android MediaCodec offers software codecs as well).

CodecKinds.description: Enum defining the kind of media a codec is processing.

VideoMediaTypes.description:
Enum listing video media types.


The enum member names are matching exactly those that are used by ffmpeg. Exception: Items that are starting with a number are prefixed with an underscore here.

BitRate.description:
A type for handling bit rates.


The purpose of this type is to avoid manual calculations and conversions in code,             unified handling and conversion as well as presentation through its various To\*\*\*String methods.


`System.IComparable`


`System.IEquatable`1`

ColorFormats.description:
Enum listing color formats.


The enum member names are matching those that are used by ffmpeg. (execute 'ffmpeg \-pix\_fmts' to list them) Exception: Items that are starting with a number are prefixed with an underscore here. In ffmpeg code these are prefixed with 'AV\_PIX\_FMT\_' and all\-caps.

ResolutionRates.description: Examples for the maximum supported combinations of resolution and rate for this level.

ResolutionRateStrings.description: Examples for the maximum supported combinations of resolution and rate for this level as string values.

ResolutionRatesDisplay.description: A single string from the `Emby.Media.Model.Types.LevelInformation.ResolutionRateStrings` list.

Struct representing a combination of video resolution and frame rate.


`System.IEquatable`1`

`System.IComparable`


`System.IEquatable`1`

apikeyauth.name: api_key
apikeyauth.description:
**ApiKey Authentication**  
API keys are static access tokens providing access to the Emby API for external applications.  
  
Keys can be created from the Server Dashboard under **Advanced > Security**  
The api key can alternatively be specified in an http header named _X-Emby-Token_  
For details please see the [API Documentation: ApiKey Authentication](https://github.com/MediaBrowser/Emby/wiki/ApiKeyAuthentication)
